name: Tanish Shah
profile: Tanish Shah is a dedicated and enthusiastic Computer Science student at D. J. Sanghvi College of Engineering. He is an ambivert with excellent communication skills, making him a great speaker and listener. He is a proactive team player with strong leadership skills, constantly seeking to learn and grow.

engineering college.name: Dwarkadas Jivanlal Sanghavi College of Engineering
engineering college.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering

experience.organization: Synapse Committee of D.J. Sanghvi College of Engineering

projects.name: Bicep Curl Repetition Counter
projects.description: A computer vision-based fitness assistant that detects and counts bicep curl repetitions using real-time video processing.
features: Uses Mediapipe's pose estimation model to detect arm movement.
Automatically counts repetitions based on the arm’s angle.
Provides real-time feedback for proper form and technique.
Can be extended for other exercises like squats and push-ups.
projects.use_case: Helps fitness enthusiasts track their workouts without needing expensive gym equipment.

projects.name: Gesture-Based DJ Control System
projects.description: A system that allows DJs to control music playback using hand gestures, eliminating the need for physical touch-based interfaces.
features: Hand tracking and gesture recognition using Mediapipe.
Implemented logarithmic volume control for a natural sound experience.
Real-time visual feedback on screen for intuitive interaction.
Auto-pause feature when no hands are detected.
User-friendly UI with a clean and minimalist design.
projects.use_case: Useful for DJs who want a touch-free, futuristic way to control their music sets during live performances.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A visually stunning and interactive portfolio website showcasing Tanish's projects, skills, and personal achievements.
features: Dark-themed UI with a dynamic starfield background.
Interactive 3D model that changes upon user interaction.
A chatbot named TAN AI that can provide insights about Tanish.
Scroll animations and hover effects for a smooth user experience.
Modular structure with reusable HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components.
projects.use_case: Allows visitors to explore Tanish's work in an engaging and interactive way.

achievements: Member of the school’s football and cricket team for 3 years with unbeaten records.
Instructor at Nehru Science Centre’s robotic workshops, teaching students how to build and program robots using LEGO.

personality_analysis.problem_solving: Tanish is highly analytical and enjoys solving complex problems, especially in AI, machine learning, and cybersecurity.
personality_analysis.creativity: He is very creative, especially when designing UI/UX for his projects. He focuses on aesthetics and user experience.
personality_analysis.learning_mentality: Tanish is self-motivated and constantly seeks to improve his skills. He is always working on new projects and exploring different technologies.
personality_analysis.work_ethic: He is dedicated and detail-oriented, ensuring that every aspect of his projects is polished before considering them complete.
personality_analysis.communication: Despite being an ambivert, he is an effective communicator, capable of explaining complex topics clearly and concisely.
personality_analysis.passion_for_technology: Tanish is deeply passionate about AI, ML, and cybersecurity. He enjoys pushing the boundaries of what technology can do.
personality_analysis.attention_to_detail: He dislikes cluttered or unpolished work, striving for clean and refined designs in both code and UI/UX.
